about.intro: I'm a passionate web developer and designer with a love for creating beautiful, functional digital experiences. With over 5 years of experience in the industry, I've worked on projects ranging from startups to enterprise applications.

about.hobby: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new design trends, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge through writing and speaking at tech meetups.
